title: Roman_Picisan
author: Roman_Picisan
content: I don't know if someone has said it here or not or something else with those three words. For me those three words are the initial foundation for anyone to go to the future.Success or failure of a person depends on how confident a person is in what he is going through. On the way a person is often shifted from the destination. It could be due to tiredness and the hardness of the challenges faced. Therefore, the goals that have been set at the beginning of the journey will be enjoyed if you never give up.A newbie who lives it without burden even though in his journey many things are faced but can enjoy it by making it all a process, without realizing that maybe he is now legendary.In the end, I, who have aspirations to become a pro trader and someone who has moved from the bottom, really enjoyed this journey to the highest level.There is no need to record how many losses we have spent while trading and there is no need to blame ourselves for how many mistakes we have made, because the most important thing is not how the goal is but how the process arrives at a goal.Basically every human being walks using the heart with the help of reason.No human wants war but to live in peace.If on the way tired, rest.When you feel excited again, continue.Roman_Picisan

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: I think it's not quite right on the reputation board because you discuss from a trading point of view maybe it's more appropriate on the trading board or even at the beginner and the Help is there about your experience to become a pro trader and also your journey from a newbie.I know you want to share experiences but that's my assumption, so if it's not quite right this thread will stay here.

comments.author: harapan
comments.body: Having a goal and working towards it can get really hard sometimes, it all depends on how prepared your mind is.I am of the school of thought that no good thing comes cheap. You have to fight and pay the price for it. You have to always belief and be positive about your goals. There will be setbacks on your journeys, obstacles will come, but you're well equipped to handle every thing that comes your way.The fact that you shouldn't give up doesn't mean you will keep on doing the same thing and hoping for a different or better result, Nah. Yea, everybody should work hard, but everybody should also work smart.  Hard work alone won't get you were you want to be if you're not smart about it.

Of course hard working is consider as your discipline and consistency for you to achieve your goal. It will also payoff for you in a long time since you can adapt those consistency in the future. comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Roman_Picisan on April 04, 2023, 04:35:16 PMI, who have aspirations to become a pro trader and someone who has moved from the bottom, really enjoyed this journey to the highest level.There is no need to record how many losses we have spent while trading and there is no need to blame ourselves for how many mistakes we have made, because the most important thing is not how the goal is but how the process arrives at a goal.My dear friend becoming a professional trader is a path filled with numerous obstacles and hurdles. It's a very challenging task and it requires hard work and consistency. Along the journey one has to overcome the emotional attacks of guilt caused by losses. If someone can successfully overcome the feelings of guilt and fear they will be able to make sound decisions. In the process of trading one must dedicate 80% of their time to market speculation and 20% of their time to actual trading. Even with proper strategies and  strong trading plans things can go wrong and the result can be a huge loss. That's why we must always speculate the markets and trade only when we are sure that the outcome is going to be in our favor. Becoming a professional trader is a tough road my friend but it is definitely achievable.

To be a pro trader, it usually comes with top sacrifices which might affect you for lifetime, the question is, how you ready to take that bold step that will change your life?

comments.author: mvdheuvel1983
comments.body: There are ups and downs in trading. I chose not to call them failures but critical learning points. It is a part of success. I haven't known any trader who didn't feel like giving up when at some point they were making little to no profit and on some days losses. Successful traders that I know have the highest form of grit, perseverance, I would even say it isn't about talent or intelligence that makes them keep going it is the two aforementioned qualities. It makes them persist through the trading journey until they reach their goal.If you are a trader you cannot do it alone especially when you are starting out you need a community or network of people to fall back on for emotional and moral support when it becomes tough.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Most of the community here on the forum knows that crypto trading has many failures that can be given to any of us here. The only question is how strong we will last here. Because most of the trading in crypto is pure failure, especially if we don't know enough about it.That's why if you have a goal, for sure you should also prepare for the struggles you may face. But when we overcome this, when the right time comes, you can make a profit in trading at any time you want, whether it's a big or small profit.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Of course in life, there will be a lot of of challenges, it will not be a clear road, there will be bumps a long the way in our journey. And if we can relate this to crypto investment or trader, there were times that we are going to lose, there were times that we want to quit and look for other ways to make money specially in a bear market wherein everyone is dishearten to see the price plummeting all time high.And yet, we have to face it, just like what the saying goes, "face your fears" and took the pleasure of the pain and yet enjoy it. And when go and win and overcome that hardship and not so comfort experience, for sure it will make us a better person and in the end it will spell success on us.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: No matter how easy or difficult it is to attain one's desired goal, there must have been a process to get there. The process varies depending on how easy or difficult it is for each individual. Those that do not give up and confront the obstacles ahead are the ones who enjoy it in the end. Facing a challenge as soon as you hear about it may be advantageous, but we often look away from it and want to see how far the process has progressed before taking on the challenge, which may result in the process already being hardened and one being unable to face the burden it entails by then.This is similar to the early holders of bitcoin, today, they're the ones having the rave of the moment just how bitcoin has shoot up since its inception. They join in early, and faced the challenge that came with the process and today they're enjoying it.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.created_time: April 16, 2023, 11:02:51 PMLast edit: April 16, 2023, 11:25:49 PM by Hamza2424

On the way a person is often shifted from the destination. It could be due to tiredness and the hardness of the challenges faced. Therefore, the goals that have been set at the beginning of the journey will be enjoyed if you never give up.Motivational Speech by OP, Sometimes we start a Journey and then keep moving forward and a time comes when we realize we this not far from the destination, and then we double our effort to achieve but there comes a phase in between this journey where we don't know what to do Quit or Keep Moving because things are getting worse now and you've lost confidence on your policies still on that time who bear these hardships, achieve his goals. Once he did it then he realize that his journies most beautiful part was the time when he was confused the smile on that time on his face was worth more than anything called success.Trading is a good career but it tests your consistency and dedication after testing a few years when you start making huge gains then you realize that the past is the reason that you are successful today. I use to recommend everyone who is new to trading that  bro be consistent profit and loss is just a matter of time if you quit then you lose otherwise everything is good just keep moving.

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: Quote from: Roman_Picisan on April 04, 2023, 04:35:16 PMThere is no need to record how many losses we have spent while trading and there is no need to blame ourselves for how many mistakes we have made, because the most important thing is not how the goal is but how the process arrives at a goal.Why not? I mean if you do that, you will forget your mistakes. It is important to learn from your mistakes and move on, move forward so that you never do the same mistakes. I got your point on what you are trying to say. But isn't it better to suffer first and learn to never do that again. After that, if the results are on the positive side, you will enjoy it even more than what you said. We are humans, after all. We are not perfect, we make mistakes. But those who wants to become somewhat perfect, for them the process of keeping records of past losses are important. I don't know, how are you going to be happy if the history keeps repeating itself?

comments.author: alastantiger
comments.body: Any human with a goal must go through dificult stage to achieve the said goal. Whatever it is that you go through during your goal achievement, you just have to enjoy the process. First sign of a successful goal is the tiredness and difficulties involved. Never quit when you feel tired, all you need is rest and continue knowing the end point will be profiting. Every hard works pays definitely but not immediately  all you need to so is to be consistent.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: The important thing is that you can enjoy going in the direction you want because it definitely won't be easy. But if we can stay focused on our goals and not complain, knowing it is a process, we will get there and become pro traders.The losses we get will be recovered with the abilities we have if we can keep studying well. And I agree with you if you are tired, taking a short break is better than continuing because it can refresh your mind and energy again.Results will not lie to the efforts of someone who has done it with hard work. We can be at the peak of the success we want.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: These type of "motivational speech" stuff never really made sense to me. I understand that some people would like to speak like ancient Greeks or romans and want to enlighten the world for some people.But in our modern world, we are well beyond that, our life consists of waking up, going to work, coming home, watching tv, sleeping and repeating that, sure there are some people who go outside of that, and there are situations like illness or death and that is why I feel like there are hardships here and there, but when you look at the overall situation, that's just not the thing we do everyday, we just do the other one. So, all these big talks about life and what it is about and people etc etc makes no sense to me anymore, not in 2023 at least.
